Updated November     pm



The Last of Us Season  and The White Lotus Season  likely wont premiere until  PERIOD

HBO revealed its plans for the hit series during a programming slate announcement in New York City on Thursday November  at which TV Insider was present PERIOD The Last of Us was not mentioned in its  programming presentation nor was The White Lotus meaning the earliest theyll premiere is  PERIOD

HBO CEO Casey Bloys said the writers strike which ended in September and actors strike still ongoing delayed production on The Last of Us Season  but that the series aims to begin production in early  PERIOD Production will presumably begin in  forThe White LotusSeason  strike pending PERIOD Bloys sounded optimistic that the actors strike could end soon PERIOD

More to come on this developing story
